name: In Memory
description:
Step into the memories of a prisoner of war and let his story unfold.

Locked away in a cold, dark prison cell with no hope of getting
released any time soon, all that Jedrick has
left are the most precious memories of his beloved: A means to escape
from his grim reality. In this short story made exclusively for VR,
The mental escape of Jedrick becomes a physical one as you
literally step into his memories and learn Jedrick's story.

Runtime: +/- 10 min.
